<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__3"/>Magistrate; <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> an <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21475">d</del> old benevolent <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> man <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> with <lb n="c57-0117__main__4"/>calm & mild manners. He looked <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21481"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21483">towards</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21486"/>upon <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>

<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__7"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21506">it was that</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21509">there were who</del> appeared as <w ana="start"/>wit<lb n="c57-0117__main__8"/>nesses<w ana="end"/> on this <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> occasion <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21518"/> <mdel>,</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21522"/>. <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21522"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21518"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> about half a dozen <lb n="c57-0117__main__9"/>men came <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> forward <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> and <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> one being selected <lb n="c57-0117__main__10"/>by the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> magistrate <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> he <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> deposed <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> that he had been <lb n="c57-0117__main__11"/>out fishing the night before with his son <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> &<lb n="c57-0117__main__12"/>his <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> brother-in-law, Daniel Nugent, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> when <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__13"/>about <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> nine o clock <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> they observed a strong <lb n="c57-0117__main__14"/>northerly blast <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> rising <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> & they accordingly put <lb n="c57-0117__main__15"/>in for port. It was a very dark <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> night <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> as <lb n="c57-0117__main__16"/>the moon had not yet risen; They did not <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__17"/>lan <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21549"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21557"/>d <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21557"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21549"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> at the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> harbour <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> but, as they had been <lb n="c57-0117__main__18"/>accustomed, at a creek about two miles <lb n="c57-0117__main__19"/>below. He <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> went first <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> carrying a part <lb n="c57-0117__main__20"/>of the fishing <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> tackle <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> & his companions <lb n="c57-0117__main__21"/>followed him at some distance. As he <lb n="c57-0117__main__22"/>was <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> walking <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> along the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> sands <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> he <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21572"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21574">hit</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21577"/>struck <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21577"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21572"/>his foot <lb n="c57-0117__main__23"/>against <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> somthing <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> & fell <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> all <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> his length on <lb n="c57-0117__main__24"/>the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> ground; <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> his <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> comrades <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> came up to assist <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__25"/>him & <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> by the light of their <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> lantern <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> they <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__26"/>discovered <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> that he had fallen on the <lb n="c57-0117__main__27"/>body of a <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> man <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> who was to all appearance <lb n="c57-0117__main__28"/>dead. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__29"/>Their first supposition <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> was <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> that <lb n="c57-0117__main__30"/>it was the corpse of <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21601"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21603">man</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21606"/>some person <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21606"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21601"/>who had been <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0117__main__31"/>drowned <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> & thrown on shore by the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> waves, <lb n="c57-0117__main__32"/>But <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> upon <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> examination <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> they found that <lb n="c57-0117__main__33"/>the clothes were not <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> wet <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> &<mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21617"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21619"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21619"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21625"/>even <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21625"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21617"/>that the body <lb n="c57-0117__main__34"/>was not <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> yet <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> cold. They instantly carried <lb n="c57-0117__main__35"/>it to the cottage of an old woman <lb n="c57-0117__main__36"/>near <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21635"/>the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> spot <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21635"/>& <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> endeavoured <mod sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21638"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21640"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21640"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0117__main__d4e21646"/>but in <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> vain <sga-add eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21646"/><mod eID="c57-0117__main__d4e21638"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> to restore it to <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> life <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0117__main__d4e21651">but</del> <lb n="c57-0118__main__1"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0118__main__d4e21664">In vain</del> . <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> He <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> appeared to <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> have been <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> a handsome <lb n="c57-0118__main__2"/>young <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> man <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> about twenty years of age. He <lb n="c57-0118__main__3"/>had apparently been <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> strangled <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> for there <lb n="c57-0118__main__4"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0118.01"/><lb n="c57-0118__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0118__left_margin__d4e21680"/>was <sga-add eID="c57-0118__left_margin__d4e21680"/>no sign of any <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> violence <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> except the black <lb n="c57-0118__main__5"/>mark of fingers on his neck. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0118__main__6"/>The first <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0118__main__d4e21690"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0118__main__d4e21692"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0118__main__d4e21692"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0118__main__d4e21698"/>part <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0118__main__d4e21698"/><mod eID="c57-0118__main__d4e21690"/>of this deposition did not <lb n="c57-0118__main__7"/>in the least <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> interrest me <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> but when the <lb n="c57-0118__main__8"/>mark of the fingers was <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> mentioned <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I <w ana="start"/>remem<lb n="c57-0118__main__9"/>bered<w ana="end"/> the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0118__main__d4e21713">the</del> murder of my <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> brother <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> & felt <lb n="c57-0118__main__10"/>myself extremely agitated; my limbs <seg eID="c57-0118__main__d4e21723"/><mod eID="c57-0118__main__d4e21719"/> mbled <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0118__main__11"/>& a mist came over my <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> eyes <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> which obliged <lb n="c57-0118__main__12"/>me to lean on a chair for <seg judge <lb n="c57-0118__main__22"/>by the light of a few <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> stars <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> it was the same <lb
